name: gitbook-plugin-page-numbering
description: Add support for numbering pages, table, figures, etc... in GitBook.

skipReadme.description: Skip README.md or README.adoc in the numbering.

chapterFormat.description: The automatic heading used for chapters. Use #chapno# for the numbering, and #title# for the title. If different headings are used in different depths, use ||| to separate automatic headings in different depths.

forceMultipleParts.description: Force multiple-part numberings. If false, the part number is skipped if there is only a single part.
